amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funding to approve class III gaming on Indian lands by any means other than a Tribal-State compact entered into between a State and a tribe.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funding to be used to approve class III gaming on Indian lands by any means other than a Tribal-State compact entered into between a State and a tribe.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (FL) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 217 (Roll no. 289).
